name: Superior Recruiting
tag_list: market-research, tampa-market-research, focus-groups, research, ethnographic-research, mystery-shops, store-intercepts, recruiting, marketing, database, moderators, mock-jury, facilities, rental, research-tampa-florida, florida-market-research, idis, nati
overview:
We are a full-service marketing research recruiting firm in Tampa, Florida. We are formally Superior Research Tampa. We have an extensive database that we have been building for 18 years. We specialize in recruiting medical, consumer, and business professionals. We also manage and execute mystery shops, shop a longs, online diaries, store intercepts and mock juries.

We recruit for Individual Interviews, Focus groups, ethnographic research,online blogs, and online diaries. Our database is comprised of both local and national respondents.

We can also manage your project for you. Our experienced, in-house moderator has experience with all forms of market research.

Our show rate is beyond compare! We strive to make sure that you have full groups of articulate, qualified respondents.

Specialties We specialize in recruiting medical, consumer, and business professionals.

We have recruited for IDI’s, Focus groups, ethnographic research
